data.name: Grove flowers
data.detailed_description:
This game is similar in style to the Arcanoid. In this game, you are given the opportunity to control the platform and the fir-tree cone. Your task is to destroy all the blocks and prevent the fir cone from falling beyond the specified limits. You will receive points by collecting flowers, fish and even cats, which will fall out after destroy blocks. In the process of passing the levels, the game will create more and more difficult and long conditions for passing the level.

The gameplay of the game is very simple and filled with the sounds of nature, and the atmosphere of the game will lift your mood. This is not an epic game, but it is made for those who want a positive atmosphere.

Special features
  • 30 levels
  • 50 Diverse Blocks
  • Bonuses
  • Strange gameplay
  • Gamepad

data.short_description: This game is similar in style to the Arcanoid. In this game, you are given the opportunity to control the platform and the fir cone. Your task is to break all the blocks and prevent the fir cone from falling beyond the specified limits.
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Traditional Chinese, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 [32, 64], Windows 10 [32, 64] Bit, Windows 8.1 [32, 64] Bit, Windows 8 [32, 64] bit Bit, Windows XP [32, 64] Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® G4400 @ 3.3GHz (2 CPUs) /AMD A4-6300 @ 3.7GHz (2 CPUs)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 4000 with 1 GB of RAM / AMD HD 4870 1GB
  • Storage: 370 MB available space
